name: abdominally

in a way that relates to the abdomen or is done through the wall (= the outer part) of the abdomen: The doctor palpated the patient abdominally. A hysterectomy can be performed either vaginally or abdominally.
More examplesFewer examplesUltrasounds of the uterus done abdominally usually do not provide the detail needed for accurate diagnosis.As part of the experiment, the insects were injected abdominally with the extract.Learning to breathe abdominally can bring many health benefits, including a general relief of tension. Abdominally obese people have a dangerous amount of excess fat around their belly.
